```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE, 
  fig.width=8,
  fig.height=8
)
```


```{r, include=FALSE}
devtools::load_all()
library(MundusCentrum)
```

```{r}
# set player you want to render (this would come from shiny input)
PLAYER <- "big_grizz"
TURN <- "006A"
```


```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
cat(glue("# {PLAYER} :: Turn {TURN}\n\n"))
game <- load_game("anno_duo_db", TURN)
print(game, .p = PLAYER)
```


```{r eval = FALSE}
# player input

input_unit(game, .p, "F1") %>% 
  input_action()

```


### Current state

This is the state of the game.

```{r, results = "asis"}
print(draw_map(game, PLAYER))
print_map_df(game, PLAYER)
```
